verses.verse: לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo not לָ֥נוּ La-nu יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Not unto us O LORD לֹ֫א <WH3808> lo not לָ֥נוּ La-nu כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- But לְ֭שִׁמְךָ <WH8034> Le-shim-cha not unto us but unto thy name תֵּ֣ן <WH5414> ten give כָּב֑וֹד <WH3519> ka-Vod; glory עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- Because חַ֝סְדְּךָ֗ <WH2617> chas-de-cha, for thy mercy עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- because אֲמִתֶּֽךָ׃ <WH571> 'a-mit-Te-cha. [and] for thy truth's

לָ֭מָּה <WH4100> Lam-mah Why יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> yo-me-Ru say הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim; Wherefore should the heathen אַיֵּה־ <WH346> 'ai-yeh- Where נָ֝֗א <WH4994> Na, now אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-hei-Hem. angels

יְדֵיהֶ֤ם׀ <WH3027> ye-dei-Hem They have hands וְלֹ֬א <WH3808> ve-Lo cannot יְמִישׁ֗וּן <WH4184> ye-mi-Shun, but they handle רַ֭גְלֵיהֶם <WH7272> Rag-lei-hem not feet וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo cannot יְהַלֵּ֑כוּ <WH1980> ye-hal-Le-chu; have they but they walk לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- cannot יֶ֝הְגּ֗וּ <WH1897> yeh-Gu, not neither speak בִּגְרוֹנָֽם׃ <WH1627> big-ro-Nam. they through their throat

כְּ֭מוֹהֶם <WH3644> Ke-mo-hem like יִהְי֣וּ <WH1961> yih-Yu will become עֹשֵׂיהֶ֑ם <WH6213> 'o-sei-Hem; They that make כֹּ֭ל <WH3605> kol Everyone אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- who בֹּטֵ֣חַ <WH982> bo-Te-ach them are like unto them [so is] every one that trusteth בָּהֶֽם׃ ba-Hem.

יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD זְכָרָ֪נוּ <WH2142> ze-cha-Ra-nu hath been mindful יְבָ֫רֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> ye-Va-Rech of us he will bless יְ֭בָרֵךְ <WH1288> Ye-va-rech [us] he will bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel יְ֝בָרֵ֗ךְ <WH1288> ye-va-Rech, he will bless אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit the house אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron. of Aaron

יֹסֵ֣ף <WH3254> yo-Sef shall increase יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem; and עֲ֝לֵיכֶ֗ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem, and וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- and בְּנֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1121> be-nei-Chem. you more and more you and your children

בְּרוּכִ֣ים <WH1288> be-ru-Chim Ye [are] blessed אַ֭תֶּם <WH859> 'At-tem you לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD עֹ֝שֵׂ֗ה <WH6213> 'o-Seh, which made שָׁמַ֥יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim heaven וָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> va-'A-retz. and earth

הַשָּׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim The heaven שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> ma-yim [even] the heavens לַיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; [are] the LORD'S וְ֝הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> ve-ha-'A-retz, but the earth נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> na-Tan hath he given לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> liv-nei- to the children אָדָֽם׃ <WH120> 'a-Dam. of men

וַאֲנַ֤חְנוּ׀ <WH587> va-'a-Nach-nu we נְבָ֘רֵ֤ךְ <WH1288> ne-Va-Rech But we will bless יָ֗הּ <WH3050> Yah, the LORD מֵֽעַתָּ֥ה <WH6258> me-'at-Tah this וְעַד־ <WH5704> ve-'ad- from this time forth and for עוֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> o-Lam, evermore הַֽלְלוּ־ <WH1984> hal-lu- Praise יָֽהּ׃ <WH3050> Yah. the LORD
